content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0, 0) with coal inventory (50/50) and status warnings indicating no ingredients to smelt and that the fuel source is full.
- Stone furnace (position 2, 0) with coal inventory (47/50) and status warning indicating no ingredients to smelt.
- Stone furnace (position 4, 0) with coal inventory (50/50) and status warnings indicating no ingredients to smelt and that the fuel source is full.
- Stone furnace (position 6, 0) with coal inventory (3/50) and status warning indicating no ingredients to smelt.

### Wooden chest at position(8.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 8.5, 0.5) with an empty inventory.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure your inventory has the required items before attempting to insert them into the furnace. For example, you encountered errors when trying to insert coal and iron ore due to insufficient items in your inventory.

### Errors when extracting items from the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace contains the items you are trying to extract. You received an error indicating that no valid stone-furnace entity contained the iron plates you were attempting to extract.

### Errors when the furnace inventory is full
- Monitor the inventory of the furnace before inserting items. You received multiple errors indicating that the furnace was full and could not accept additional coal.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have enough raw materials to craft items. You encountered an error indicating not enough iron plates to craft iron gear wheels.
